name: CANTEK INDUSTRIES LIMITED
tag_list: toner, toner-cartridge, printer-supply, printer-consumables, compatible-toner-cartridge, inkjet-cartridge, toner-cartridges
overview:
CANTEK INDUSTRIES LIMITED is a professional manufacturer of printer consumables with the production location in Shenzhen, China. CANTEK has successfully managed the manufacturing and marketing of aftermarket printer consumables for 10 years in both domestic and overseas market. The compatible products of CANTEK fully range from LaserJet toner cartridges to Inkjet cartridges for the major printer brands.

CANTEK focuses on the consistent investment in R&D and OEM service. Outstanding control of cost and quality enables CANTEK to expand its sales network from local market to global export and distribution network. CANTEK keeps raising integrated competitiveness in the printer supplies industry by optimizing all of its resources. Targeting in domestic market, CANTEK has set up its head office in Nanjing city, while moving its export department to Shanghai - the largest city of China.

By specializing in the manufacture and research of compatible toner cartridges and Inkjet cartridges for brands like HP, CANON, BROTHER, SAMSUNG, LEXMARK, EPSON, PANASONIC, XEROX, DELL, LENOVO, KYOCERA, OKI etc. CANTEK is confident to stand together with the most professional global companies who are involved into the field of distribution and sales of printer consumables

Manufacturing Facilities

1) 8,000 square meters advanced manufacturing facilities with 200 workers and 12 engineers 2) ISO9001: 2000 Quality Certified System; CE approved product ranges 3) Production capacity monthly: 80,000pcs LaserJet toner cartridges and 100,000pcs Ink cartridges 4) Full product ranges compatible with major original brand printers

5) Consistent and fast R&D of new models compatible for the latest printers 6) Strict Quality Assurance and Quality Control systems 7) Rich experience of OEM and ODM for global clients 8) Professional service teams transferring core values to our clients

milestones.description: CANTEK INDUSTRIES LIMITED has updated its new production facilities for its mono toner cartridges with a total monthly capacity up to 250,000pcs.
milestones.source_description: CANTEK's new Production Facility has been updated

external_links.title: Cantek's production line has been updated
